name: Shen Tong
story: Yun Lam grew up in a small town in rural China. He always dreamed of leaving his small town and seeing the world. After hearing of the opportunities in the military, he joined the Chinese army at the age of 18. He quickly worked his way up to become a rifleman in the OPFOR faction. Despite his reserved personality, Yun Lam is a force to be reckoned with on the battlefield.
